description: GR Auto Gallery is pleased to offer this highly original, high quality, 1979 Ford F150 Lariat 4X4 pick up for consideration. This truck spend the majority of its life in Utah and with the exception of a repaint in its original colors 20 years ago remains original. The truck is powered by its 400 CID V8 engine, 4 speed transmission with low gear, and part time 4 wheel drive with locking front hubs. This truck is extremely clean in all areas and is an exceptional driver in all driving situations from the farm field to the highway. The original interior remains in great shape showing less wear than one would expect. The dash, seat, carpet and gauge cluster all show very nicely. The exterior paint is deep and glossy, the Lariat trim package is complete, glass is good, the original frame and underside is clean and dry, etc.  Features included: original 400 V8, manual transmission, power steering, power brakes, jack, chrome step rear bumper, chrome wheels, Sparkomatic after market stereo with cassette, trailer brake, Lariat trim, good tires, etc.

Mechanically, this truck is rock solid, turn key and is ready to take anywhere. Classic pickups have taken over some ground in the collectible and investment vehicle market and clean, highly original trucks as the one offered here offers much potential in use and investment and will not last on our floor long.
To see over 80 photos of this car, including under carriage please visit our website www.grautogallery.com

Gr Auto Gallery, LLC and our sister company, Wheelz Sales and Leasing Inc. makes every effort to represent each vehicle accurately and with integrity. We also welcome third party inspections when necessary. Although we try to do our very best to be accurate in our description writing we are human and do make mistakes. Unless otherwise noted, All vehicles are sold AS IS, No Warranty Expressed or Implied. All sales final.
